availability.description: Ozone and Stratospheric Water Vapour Data
availability.name: Ozone and stratospheric water vapour concentration databases for CMIP6

description: Apply stratospheric water vapour concentrations from the stratospheric water vapour concentration database.
name: Historical Stratospheric H2O Concentrations
rationale: Many ESMs and AOGCMs lack realistic stratospheric water vapour fields, despite its importance for surface climate.
keywords: historical, stratospheric, Water Vapour, H2O, concentrations
